original_text: For Israel hath forgotten his Maker, and buildeth temples; and Judah hath multiplied fenced cities: but I will send a fire upon his cities, and it shall devour the palaces thereof.
korean_text: 이스라엘은 자기를 지으신 이를 잊어버리고 왕궁들을 세웠으며 유다는 견고한 성읍을 많이 쌓았으나 내가 그 성읍들에 불을 보내어 그 성들을 삼키게 하리라

sentences.original_text: For Israel hath forgotten his Maker
and Judah hath multiplied fenced cities
but I will send a fire upon his cities
and it shall devour the palaces thereof
